00039 #include <QAbstractButton>
00040 #include <QFileDialog>
00041 #include <QDir>
00042 
00043 #include "RandomDeviateFactory.h"
00044 #include "RayTraceDialog.h"
00045 #include "TPhotonMapFactory.h"
00046 
00052 RayTraceDialog::RayTraceDialog( QWidget * parent, Qt::WindowFlags f )
00053 :QDialog ( parent, f ), m_numRays( 0 ), m_selectedRandomFactory( -1 ), m_fraction( 0.0 ), m_drawPhotons( false ), m_selectedPhotonMapFactory( -1 ), m_increasePhotonMap( false )
00054 {
00055         setupUi( this );
00056         connect( this, SIGNAL( accepted() ), this, SLOT( saveChanges() ) );
00057         connect( buttonBox, SIGNAL( clicked( QAbstractButton* ) ), this, SLOT( applyChanges( QAbstractButton* ) ) );
00058 }
00059 
00065 RayTraceDialog::RayTraceDialog( int numRays, QVector< RandomDeviateFactory* > randomFactoryList, double fraction,int widthDivisions, int heightDivisions, bool drawPhotons, QVector< TPhotonMapFactory* > photonMapFactoryList, int selectedRandomFactory, int selectedPhotonMapFactory, bool increasePhotonMap, QWidget * parent, Qt::WindowFlags f )
00066 :QDialog ( parent, f ), m_numRays( numRays ), m_selectedRandomFactory(selectedRandomFactory), m_fraction( fraction ),m_widthDivisions(widthDivisions),m_heightDivisions(heightDivisions), m_drawPhotons( drawPhotons ), m_selectedPhotonMapFactory( selectedPhotonMapFactory ), m_increasePhotonMap( increasePhotonMap )
00067 {
00068         setupUi( this );
00069         raysSpinBox->setValue( m_numRays );
00070         for( int index = 0; index < randomFactoryList.size(); ++index )
00071         {
00072                 randomCombo->addItem( randomFactoryList[index]->RandomDeviateIcon(), randomFactoryList[index]->RandomDeviateName() );
00073         }
00074         if( m_selectedRandomFactory < 0 && randomFactoryList.size() > 0 )
00075                 m_selectedRandomFactory =0;
00076         randomCombo->setCurrentIndex( m_selectedRandomFactory );
00077 
00078         drawSpin->setValue( m_fraction );
00079         widthDivisionsSpinBox->setValue( m_widthDivisions );
00080         heightDivisionsSpinBox->setValue( m_heightDivisions );
00081         photonsCheck->setChecked( m_drawPhotons );
00082 
00083         for( int index = 0; index < photonMapFactoryList.size(); ++index )
00084         {
00085                 photonmapTypeCombo->addItem( photonMapFactoryList[index]->TPhotonMapIcon(), photonMapFactoryList[index]->TPhotonMapName() );
00086         }
00087         if( ( m_selectedPhotonMapFactory < 0  ) & ( photonMapFactoryList.size() > 0 ) ) m_selectedPhotonMapFactory = 0;
00088         photonmapTypeCombo->setCurrentIndex( m_selectedPhotonMapFactory );
00089 
00090         if ( m_increasePhotonMap )
00091                 increaseMapRadio->setChecked( true );
00092         else
00093                 newMapRadio->setChecked( true );
00094 
00095         connect( this, SIGNAL( accepted() ), this, SLOT( saveChanges() ) );
00096         connect( buttonBox, SIGNAL( clicked( QAbstractButton* ) ), this, SLOT( applyChanges( QAbstractButton* ) ) );
00097 }

00170 
00174 void RayTraceDialog::applyChanges( QAbstractButton* button  )
00175 {
00176         if( buttonBox->buttonRole( button ) == 8 ) saveChanges();
00177 }
00178 
00182 void RayTraceDialog::saveChanges()
00183 {
00184         m_numRays = raysSpinBox->value();
00185         m_selectedRandomFactory = randomCombo->currentIndex();
00186 
00187         m_fraction = drawSpin->value();
00188         m_widthDivisions= widthDivisionsSpinBox->value();
00189         m_heightDivisions= heightDivisionsSpinBox->value();
00190         m_drawPhotons = photonsCheck->isChecked();
00191 
00192         m_selectedPhotonMapFactory = photonmapTypeCombo->currentIndex();
00193         if( newMapRadio->isChecked() )
00194                 m_increasePhotonMap = false;
00195         else
00196                 m_increasePhotonMap = true;
00197 }
